item.name: Auth
item.description:
#### POST `/api/register`

- **Description**: Register a new user and auto-create a wallet.
    
- **Request Body (JSON)**:
    

{  
"name": "Abdulrahman Adekeye",  
"email": "[Abdul@gmail.com](https://mailto:Abdul@gmail.com)",  
"password": "12345678"  
}

- **Notes**:
    
    - Password is hashed with bcrypt.
        
    - Wallet created automatically with balance 0. but i manually added price to the wallet directly from database for easy testing

item.name: Wallet & Transfers
item.description:
StartFragment

#### POST `/api/transfer`

- **Description**: Initiate a money transfer (requires receiver approval).
    
- **Headers**: Authorization: Bearer `{{token}}`
    
- **Request Body (JSON)**:
    

{  
"receiver_wallet_id": "uuid-of-receiver",  
"amount": 500  
}

- **Validations**:
    
    - Sender must have enough balance
        
    - Cannot send to self
        
    - Receiver wallet must exist
        
- **Notes**:
    
    - Status will be set to `PENDING`
        
    - Amount reserved from sender
        

EndFragment

item.name: Transactions
item.description:
#### POST `/api/transactions/:id/accept`

- **Description**: Receiver accepts the pending transfer.
    
- **Headers**: Authorization: Bearer `{{token}}`
    
- **URL Example**: `/api/transactions/12345/accept`
    
- **Notes**:
    
    - Funds moved to receiver
        
    - Status updated to `COMPLETED`
        
    - Sender notified
        

#### POST `/api/transactions/:id/decline`

- **Description**: Receiver declines the transfer.
    
- **Headers**: Authorization: Bearer `{{token}}`
    
- **URL Example**: `/api/transactions/12345/decline`
    
- **Notes**:
    
    - Funds refunded to sender
        
    - Status updated to `DECLINED`
        
    - Sender notified
        

#### GET `/api/transactions`

- **Description**: Fetch user transactions.
    
- **Headers**: Authorization: Bearer `{{token}}`
    
- **Query Params**:
    
    - `?status=pending`
        
    - `?type=sent|received`
        
    - `?limit=10&skip=0`
        

#### GET `/api/admin/transactions`

- **Description**: Fetch all user transactions.
    
- **Headers**: Authorization: Bearer `{{token}}`
    
- **Query Params**:
    
    - `?status=pending`
        
    - `?type=sent|received`
        
    - `?limit=10&skip=0`

item.name: Notifications
item.description:

- **Headers**: Authorization: Bearer `{{token}}`
